article.name: How do I finish registering an account with the status (In Registration Process)?
article.title: How do I finish registering an account with the status (In Registration Process)?
article.body:
• If you registered your account via an email invitation to an organization, you will receive a follow-up email titled "[Mackerel] Please verify your email". Use the URL provided in this email to set a password.
  • If you can’t access this email, the password can also be set from your Account Settings.
  • If an account’s registration is incomplete (In Registration Process), the following services will be restricted.
    • Email notifications such as alerts
    • The ability to transfer owner authority
